Question: On January 17, 1961, this person gave his final televised Address to the Nation from the Oval Office.
Hints: This person made greater use of press conferences than any prior president, holding almost 200 in his two terms.
This person forced Israel, the UK, and France to end their invasion of Egypt during the Suez Crisis of 1956.
The ____ family settled in York, Pennsylvania, in 1730, and in the 1880s they moved to Kansas.
